Columns.Description: The (UTC) date and time the assessment was generated
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: The subscription ID of the assessed resource
Columns.Name: RegulatoryComplianceSubscriptionId

Columns.Description: The ID of the assessed resource
Columns.Name: AssessedResourceId

Columns.Description: The ID of the assessed recommendation
Columns.Name: RecommendationId

Columns.Description: The name of regulatory compliance control
Columns.Name: ComplianceControl

Columns.Description: The number of resources that passed this assessment
Columns.Name: SkippedResources

Columns.Description: The number of resources that passed this assessment
Columns.Name: PassedResources

Columns.Description: The number of resources that failed this assessment
Columns.Name: FailedResources

Columns.Description: Resource provider type of the assessed resource
Columns.Name: ResourceProviderType

Columns.Description: A link for more details on the assessment result
Columns.Name: RecommendationLink

Columns.Description: Indicates whether the data was exported as part of a snapshot when 'true', or streamed in real-time when 'false'.
Columns.Name: IsSnapshot

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
